channel.title: Lambda Core bug. [Fixed]
channel.description:
Pretty small bug, but can be frustrating.. Just add a triggger_hurt, right before the ceiling so this doesn't happen.
So you hop on this.. [img]https://u.filepak.com/JnoJ_2012-09-14_00054.jpg[/img]
Wait on this, till you get to the indented ceiling. [img]https://u.filepak.com/V7Kk_2012-09-14_00055.jpg[/img]
Yippy! You get a nice view of Nodraw! [img]https://u.filepak.com/6zlt_2012-09-14_00056.jpg[/img]
And you're stuck in a brush. :slight_smile: [img]https://u.filepak.com/vMxQ_2012-09-14_00057.jpg[/img]

item.title: Lambda Core bug. [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: pryvisee
item.description:
Pretty small bug, but can be frustrating… Just add a triggger_hurt, right before the ceiling so this doesn’t happen.

So you hop on this…

Wait on this, till you get to the indented ceiling.

Yippy! You get a nice view of Nodraw!

And you’re stuck in a brush.

Read full topic
